name: Baxton_Studio_Petito_Contemporary_3-tier_White_Faux_Leather_Upholstered_Shoe_Cabinet
reviews: I love the appearance and they are sturdy but 2 of the 3 came in with broken parts which had to be rigged to work. One is still questionable on working properly. Had those pieces not been broken, I would have rated these excellent
description: This Petito White 3-Tier Leather Upholstered Storage Shoe Cabinet, with metal pull out handles, provides you with ample shoe storage and a comfortable place to sit while you removing your shoes. It could be displayed side by side as a seating bench or stacked up for small space concerns. This shoe cabinet will add style and elegance to any home and takes shoe storage to a whole new level. Contemporary shoe cabinetMDF frame with white faux leather upholstery Can be used as a seating bench, seating capacity 150 lbs 2-tier fold out shoe rack with shoe storage capacity 18 pairs of adult shoes Metal pull-out handlesOptions of vertical and horizontal displaying the shoe cabinetSet includes: One (1) 3-tier shoe cabinetMaterials: Faux leather, foam, MDFFinish: Black plastic legs Upholstery color: White Upholstery fill: Foam paddingDrawer dimensions: 12 inches high x 21.25 inches wide x 4 inches deep Dimensions: 49 inches high x 24.1 inches wide x 12.1 inches deep Product Features: Includes HardwareDresser Type: Shoe CabinetMaterial: Faux Leather, WoodStyle: ContemporaryAssembly: Assembly RequiredFinish: White FinishColor: WhiteStyleContemporaryMaterialFaux Leather, WoodFinishWhite FinishAssemblyAssembly RequiredColorWhiteDresser TypeShoe CabinetProduct FeaturesIncludes Hardware
